title: Happy Friday, Voting Announcement, Kirk Franklin, MTH, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, The Chapmans, NFL Talk, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Happy Friday, Voting Announcement, Kirk Franklin, MTH, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, The Chapmans, NFL Talk, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The weekend is around the corner and the show has an important message. Go vote! Kirk Franklin loses his biological father and shows us how to forgive. J. Anthony Brown murders another one to answer a common question. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Fool #1 VS Fool #2 VS The CEO. Bad Acting Theater is back with The Chapmans. NFL Talk week 7 is here with Pimpin'. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about association, taking inventory and much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
